channel.title: Arch on Then Blog's
channel.description: Recent content in Arch on Then Blog's

item.title: Vmware install Archlinux
item.description: 0. Ready work Test environment: Vmware15.5.6pro arch-2020-07.iso You should installed Vmware and download Archlinux iso . Change your firmwaretype to UEFI (The way many tutorials did not say) 1. Start ls /sys/firmware/efi/efivars The command detect UEFI files and if your dir not include files your firmwaretype is BIOS . Then, ping google.com, detect interent connection Archwiki: Note: The installation image has systemd-networkd.service, systemd-resolved.service and iwd.service enabled by default. That will not be the case for the installed system.
